spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct. Door to the bedroom is inverted in terms of swing direction. The bathroom layout is mirrored relative to the sink and toilet placement shown in the 2D plan. Window placement in the living area and bedroom is consistent with the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is preserved and no rooms are missing. Wall thickness is consistent throughout. The utility area correctly maintains its relationship to the kitchen.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping. The living room sofas, dining table, and bedroom wardrobe/desk alignment are highly accurate to the reference. Minor variation in chair count for dining.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic projection and lighting. Soft shadows and high-quality textures provide great visual clarity. Geometry is clean with no visible artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom door swing is oriented incorrectly compared to the plan.
Bathroom fixtures (sink and toilet) are misplaced/swapped relative to the floor plan diagram.
Additional seating furniture added to the balcony not present in original 2D plan.
